name: TheCouponProjectFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Get a list of available coupons from The Coupon Project hourly using your voice from Alexa at the comfort of your bed, couch, kitchen, car, or everywhere. Coupons enumerated by Alexa are listed in the Alexa app Activity screen. So if you are interested in a coupon you heard from Alexa, you can quickly get to it by clicking on it in the Alexa app Activity screen.

All the coupons are curated from the website https://thecouponproject.com which is owned and founded by Angela Russell. The developer of this Alexa skill is not associated with or does not endorse this website. This skill just exposes the coupons available on her website to Alexa users.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
